204.title: Wimbledon tennis tournament, London
204.curiosity: Wimbledon tennis tournament by private jet
204.body:
The third of four Grand Slams in the ATP World Tour season, Wimbledon is the world’s oldest tennis tournament and is also widely regarded as the most prestigious. Get in touch with LunaJets for the best prices on private jets to Wimbledon.

First held in 1877, Wimbledon takes place every year over 2 weeks at the end of June and beginning of July at the All England Lawn Tennis Club in Wimbledon, southwest London. The tournament is extremely traditional and is the only Grand Slam to be played on grass, the sport’s original surface, and players are required to dress all in white. Wimbledon is not only an incredible sporting occasion, where fans have the opportunity to watch all the world’s greatest players compete for what is widely considered to be the most coveted trophy in tennis, but also an important social event attended by high society and even the British Royal Family. The unique atmosphere of the tournament is unlike anything else in sport and must be experienced, while Wimbledon is also an excellent excuse to visit London during the summer.

LunaJets’ experienced team are available 24/7 to find a tailor-made flight solution to suit your individual requirements, guaranteeing the best price on the market and an exceptional level of service on your private jet charter. For more information or to book your private jet to Wimbledon, please contact your LunaJets advisor.
204.airportCodes: FAB LCY BQH LTN LHR LGW STN OXF EGLW

FAB.airportDescription:
Farnborough Airport, situated an 1 hour and a half west of Central London, has a terminal devoted to private aviation, making it a great option. If you regularly travel with your dog, be advised that Farnborough Airport has a veterinary checkpoint at its disposal. Remember to ask your LunaJets Advisor about the conditions of travelling with a pet. 
For your security, the entry of cars is controlled, so it is necessary to give your flight details to whoever is collecting you, as without them they will not be allowed to enter.

LCY.airportDescription: Located in the heart of the City of London, London City Airport is the best choice if you wish to land your private jet right in the centre of the city. However, this exceptional convenience comes at a price. The landing and parking costs are substantial and specific certification is required, as only a few aircraft categories are able to land there. Be sure to consult your LunaJets' advisor to allow us to provide you with the best possible service.

BQH.airportDescription: Biggin Hill Airport is particularly popular for private jet flights to London as it is positioned less than an hour from the centre. The airport is also equipped with a veterinary checkpoint, enabling you to travel unimpaired with your pet to the UK. Remember to enquire into the conditions of travelling with a pet with your LunaJets Advisor.

LTN.airportDescription: Luton Airport is London's primary business aviation airport and, therefore, would be an excellent choice for your private jet trip. The lounges are as pleasant as they are numerous. It is also the only airport that is open 24/7 and can, therefore, be extremely useful if you have to fly at peculiar times.

LHR.airportDescription: Heathrow International Airport is situated 45 minutes west of London. It is one of Europe's most prominent airports and London's main commercial airport but is scarcely used for private aviation. If necessary, it is possible to take off from Heathrow in a private jet but the airport costs make this extremely unappealing.

LGW.airportDescription: Gatwick is the airport which caters to the south of London and it is located an hour and a half from the centre. More regularly used for commercial flights, it is not particularly recommended for your private jet travel.

STN.airportDescription: Stansted Airport is positioned an hour and a half north-east of London. Although it is usually used for commercial flights, it also offers lounges dedicated to private aviation.

OXF.airportDescription: Situated an hour and a half north-west of London, Oxford Airport is also a good option. Be advised that if you are travelling with your pet, the on-site veterinary authorities will be there to perform the necessary formalities. Remember to ask your LunaJets Advisor about the conditions of travelling with a pet.

325.title: Roland Garros, Paris
325.curiosity: Your private jet to Roland Garros
325.body:
Roland Garros is an essential part of your trip if you visit Paris during the tournament. It is the second of four Grand Slam tournaments in the tennis season. A large number of spectators set their sights on getting there every year and call LunaJets to hire their flight on a private jet.

Roland Garros is known as the most intense and physically demanding ATP tournament for the players. It is an incredible spectacle, played on clay, and is delivereed to the audience in an environment which has maintained its tradition. Each year, many people come and enjoy the facilities, which provide the height of comfort.

Hire your private jet for Roland-Garros

Arrange your flight by private plane to Roland Garros with LunaJets. Some spectators book weeks in advance to ensure the best flying conditions. We always find the best private plane for your needs. Our team of advisors is at your disposal.
325.airportCodes: LBG CDG ORY POX TNF LFPI

LBG.airportDescription: Paris Le Bourget airport is exclusively dedicated to private aviation. Open over 100 years (1914), it offers a large choice of lounges and welcoming spaces. Ideally situtated 20 minutes north of Paris and 10 minutes from Charles de Gaulle, it is the best solution for your flights to Paris by private jet. Every second year in June, the International Paris Air Show, an aviation festival, is held for aeronautical professionals and the general public. During aerial evolutions, it is possible that this airport may be closed to business aviation for short periods. Your LunaJets adviser can give you more information.

CDG.airportDescription: With its four runways, Roissy Charles de Gaulle international airport is the largest French commercial "hub". Business aircraft can often land here for transfers between commercial and private flights. For cost-efficiency, it is recommended to use Le Bourget for your flights by private plane, as the two airports are only 10 minutes apart. Your LunaJets adviser will be happy to arrange your departure from Charles de Gaulle if necessary.

ORY.airportDescription: Paris-Orly situated 30 minutes to the south of Paris sees very little private aviation but may be used for transfers. It is Paris' secondary airport and an important hub for chartered, regional, diplomatic and medical flights.  Positioning costs for business aircraft mean that it is not recommended. That said, your LunaJets adviser will be happy to arrange your journey.

POX.airportDescription: Pontoise airport can get you to the north-west of Paris. Although there are two terminals for private aviation at Pontoise, there are potential restrictions for landing and taking off here. Find out more from your LunaJets adviser.

TNF.airportDescription: Toussus-le-Noble is situated half an hour to the West of Paris, ideal for getting to the Versailles area. Even if this airport has two runways they are short. Only Light or Very Light jets are allowed to land commercially. Recently the customs office has been closed so only intra-france flights are possible. Noise restriction also limite the usage of this airport.  Your LunaJets adviser can tell you more about the restrictions of use imposed at this airport but be aware that Toussus-le-Noble is a challenging option to use for a private jet flight to Paris.

LFPI.airportDescription: Issy-les-Moulineaux heliport is ideal for getting to Paris city centre quickly. Helicopter transfers can be arranged from different private aviation airports to this heliport in west Paris.

329.title: Geneva Festival
329.curiosity: Your private jet to the Geneva festival
329.body:
The Geneva Festival is an annual event that takes place on the shores of the beautiful Lake Geneva over the course of 3 weeks from mid-July until the beginning of August. LunaJets is on hand to organise your private jet to the Geneva Festival and our team is at your service 24/7 to ensure you enjoy an unparalleled level of professional service and receive the best prices on the market on the private jet charter to Geneva.

The Geneva Festival is Switzerland’s most popular event and features 100s of attractions, including over 120 free concerts, 60 fairground rides and 150 food stalls, as well as incredible parades and many other activities. There are also various water sports competitions, such as sailing, rowing and water skiing for visitors to watch or even take part in. Taking place along the shore of Lake Geneva, right in the heart of the city, the festival is an excellent opportunity to enjoy and experience the charming Swiss city of Geneva, home to LunaJets’ headquarters. The Geneva Festival reaches its climax on its final night with an astonishing pyrotechnic display, which, choreographed to music, sees fireworks set off all around and in the middle of Lake Geneva – it is a truly remarkable sight to behold.

For more information or to hire your private jet to the Geneva Festival, please contact your LunaJets advisor.

GVA.airportDescription: Geneva Airport is perfectly located to serve many of the most popular resorts in the Alps and, therefore, features numerous private lounges to make your trip as enjoyable as possible. LunaJets team is at hand to arrange your transfer from Geneva to Chamonix, an hour and a half journey by car or 20 minutes if you choose to travel by helicopter. Be advised that, during the peak months of the ski season, Geneva Airport is extremely busy so it is important to book well in advance to be sure of securing take-off and landing slots. Get in touch with your LunaJets adviser for more information.

330.title: Festival of Lights, Berlin
330.curiosity: Your Private Jet to the Festival of Lights
330.body:
Once a year, Berlin becomes the stage for a show which illuminates the capital's most beautiful monuments: the festival of lights. LunaJets transports its clients to the event by private jet every year.

The festival takes place in October, and transforms the monuments of Berlin. The Brandenburg Gate, the Berlin Cathedral and the radio tower are enhanced by spectacular lights.

The festival of lights is an event with a unique atmosphere, which has become an unmissable date in the Berlin calendar. The event has achieved worldwide popularity in a short time and welcomes more than 2 million visitors each year.

Book your private plane for the festival of lights in Berlin.

Discover Berlin in a whole new light, and contact our advisers to charter your private jet to the festival of lights.
It is our pleasure to help you enjoy your trip and we will find you the best plane at the best rate.

SXF.airportDescription: Schoenfeld airport is often used for getting to Berlin by private plane. Located 20 minutes to the south of the city, it has dedicated terminals to welcome you before your departure. This airport has some take-off and landing restrictions due to its high level of activity. Find out more from your LunaJets adviser.

TXL.airportDescription: Berlin Tegel airport is located 30 minutes north-west of the city. It offers lounges dedicated to private aviation to welcome you. However, as this is a very busy airport, take-offs and landings are heavily regulated. Your private aviation adviser is at your disposal to arrange your flight in the best conditions possible. Transfers from your commercial flight to your private jet can be arranged in Tegel. Get in touch to find out more.

331.title: Open Air Gallery, Berlin
331.curiosity: Your private jet to the Open Air Gallery
331.body:
The Open Air Gallery, as its name suggests, is an open-air art exhibition, in the German capital. The aim of this exhibition is to encourage dialogue between exhibitors and visitors. LunaJets transports faithful fans of the event by private plane every year.

Both art professionals and new talent participate in this event each year. You will have the opportunity to discover never-before-seen works of different categories: sculptures, painting, photography...

Visitors themselves can participate and express their creativity: a 120-metre long canvas invites everyone to get painting and drawing.

Book your private plane to the Open Air Gallery

Express the artist in you at the Open Air Gallery.  Our team will look after you and get you there by private plane, as close to the event as possible. LunaJets arranges all the details for before, during and after the flight for a smooth journey at a great price, call us for your private jet charter to Berlin.
331.photoAlt: Hire a private jet to Berlin for the Open Air Gallery

Located 20 minutes to the south of the city, it has dedicated terminals to welcome you before your departure. This airport has some take-off and landing restrictions due to its high level of activity. Find out more from your LunaJets adviser.

Transfers from your commercial flight to your private jet can be arranged in Tegel. Get in touch to find out more.

333.title: Jazz Marathon, Brussels
333.curiosity: Brussels Jazz Marathon by private jet
333.body:
Each year, the Brussels Jazz Marathon brings music lovers together from all over the world, showcasing new talent in the jazz scene as well as well-known artists. LunaJets is the partner of choice for many of its clients who wish to travel by private jet to the Brussels Jazz Marathon.

The Brussels Jazz Marathon comprises more than 200 free concerts in the magnificent Brussels ciy centre, including more than 700 artists. Indeed, the concerts take place the most prestigious squares in the capital: the Grand-Place, the Sablon, the Place Sainte-Catherine...

This is an opportunity for Jazz fans to indulge in a unique atmosphere in the Belgian capital for all 3 days of their stay.

Hire your private jet to the Brussels Jazz Marathon

LunaJets is the partner for your private jet charter to the Brussels Jazz Marathon.  We will always find the best solution to suit your needs. Our expert team is at your service!

BRU.airportDescription: Located in Zaventem, 30 minutes to the north-east of the capital, Brussels international airport offers a space dedicated to private aviation as well as accommodating significant commercial traffic. This airport is an excellent option for your trips to and from Brussels by private jet. In Brussels, we can organise your transfer from your commercial plane to your private jet. Get in touch for further information.

CRL.airportDescription: Charleroi airport is located an hour south of the capital. With less traffic passing through it, it is an excellent alternative for your trips to Brussels by private plane. Indeed, its airport and parking fees are cheaper than those in Brussels, which makes its use very attractive. Find out more from your LunaJets adviser who will be happy to help you arrange your travels.

335.title: International Music Summit, Ibiza
335.curiosity: Your private jet to the International Music Summit
335.body:
The International Music Summit (IMS) is one of the music industry's most respected events, a 3-day conference taking place in Ibiza every year at the end of May. For the best prices on private jets charter to Ibiza's airport IBZ for IMS, get in touch with LunaJets expert team.

Representatives from every aspect of the music industry, including the world’s greatest electronic musicians and most influential studio executives, congregate on the legendary party island of Ibiza for IMS. The conference also represents the beginning of Ibiza’s summer season, when the island comes to life, and leads up to the official Ibiza opening weekend, which is renowned for its incredible VIP events. The summit itself climaxes with a festival held in the UNESCO World Heritage site, Dalt Vila, within the castle at the top of Ibiza's old town where the views and music are second to none.

Whether you are there for the summit's talks, shows or parties, IMS is an amazing time to visit Ibiza with LunaJets and our dedicated team are at your service 24/7 to find you the right private jet at the best price.

For more information or to book your private jet to Ibiza, please do not hesitate to contact your LunaJets advisor.

IBZ.airportDescription: Ibiza's airport is perfectly equipped for private jet travel, featuring three different VIP terminals, providing excellent lounges and a smooth service  for all categories of Business Jets. Our frequent use of the airport and close relationship with the ground staff mean that LunaJets offers an unparalleled service when it comes to flying private to Ibiza. It is advisable to book well in advance if you're planning a trip during July and August as the airport is exceptionally busy, with time 'slots' and parking permission in high-demand and, therefore, sometimes very difficult to get.

341.title: "Copa Del Rey" Regata, Mallorca
341.curiosity: Your private jet to the "Copa Del Rey" Regatta
341.body:
The Copa Del Rey Regatta is held every August in Palma bay and is a truly exquisite event which attracts spectators from all corners of the globe.

The regatta sees 120 boats of many nationalities, including some of the world's best skippers and their crews, compete over the course of six days of intense racing. The former King of Spain, Juan Carlos I, is a two-time trophy winner at the Balearic event and an annual spectator. This prestigious regatta is the pinnacle of competition sailing of the highest level in the Mediterranean and we highly recommend it, it truly is an incredible spectacle. Palma is buzzing and vibrant during the regatta week and its best bars and restaurants host exclusive drinks parties and dinners to celebrate this unforgettable event.

What better way to spend your holiday than watching this amazing regatta in the surroundings of Mallorca's natural beauty and, with LunaJets, your travel there and back will be taken care of at the best price.

How to reserve your private jet for the Copa Del Rey Regatta Mallorca.

Taking place in high-season, regatta week in Mallorca is one of the island's busiest weeks of the year and, certainly, is one not to miss. However, this means that availability at Palma de Mallorca Airport, is extremely limited. Therefore, it is necessary to organise your private charter flight with LunaJets at your earliest convenience so that we can reserve both your landing slot, and the ideal aircraft to suit your individual journey requirements.

351.title: Oktoberfest, Munich
351.body:
Every year, Oktoberfest runs from late September to the first weekend in October. LunaJets is at hand to arrange your private jet to this unmissable 16-day event, at the best price.

Steeped in 204 years of Bavarian tradition, Oktoberfest, or "Wies'n" as the locals call it, is the world's largest beer festival, which last year saw 6.4 million revellers flock to Munich. The event's popularity has gone from strength to strength and its success stems from staying true to its traditions, as visitors come from all over the world to drink authentic local beers in one of the festival's 14 vast tents. Oktoberfest is not just about the beer, as the numerous fairground rides, delicious food stalls and incredible oompah musicians demonstrate, and what better way to get there than by flying private with LunaJets?

LunaJets' bespoke service enables us to tailor the flight perfectly to suit your needs, we can even ensure some Bavarian beers are on board for your pleasure.
351.photoAlt: Charter your private jet to Oktoberfest Munich

MUC.airportDescription: Munich international airport is located 30 minutes north of the city. Its facilities allow it to welcome all types of jets. It also has comfortable lounges specially for private aviation where you can peacefully prepare for your flight. However, as this airport is highly frequented, the authorities regulate landings and take-offs. Find out more from your LunaJets adviser.

OBF.airportDescription: Oberpfaffenhofen, with less traffic than the international airport, is a very comfortable alternative for your trips to Munich. It offers comfortable lounges where you can prepare for your flight. Located to the south-west of the city it is just 30 minutes away.

AGB.airportDescription: Augsburg airport is 1 hour north-west of the city. Highly popular for private aviation, it offers a comfortable alternative for getting to Munich. With little commercial traffic passing through it is easy to get to and is a less costly solution than other regional options.

360.title: The Davis Cup
360.curiosity: Your private jet to the Davis cup
360.body:
From 21st to 23rd November this year, the Swiss tennis team will take on France in the Davis Cup Final in Lille.   The match will take place at the magnificent Stade Pierre-Mauroy, which will been specially converted to have a clay court and seat over 25,000 spectators.  The Swiss pair of Federer and Wawrinka will come up against a French team of Tsonga, Monfils or even Gasquet.

The list of chosen players remains unknown but one thing is certain, the event has us captivated already.   Since Dwight Davis started the tournament in 1900, France has won it 9 times, most recently in 2001. Switzerland, on the other hand, has still never won the Davis Cup but will do everything possible to succeed this year. It is, after all, the only major trophy that Roger Federer is yet to win.  

To get you to this unique event, LunaJets can arrange your private jet to Lille Lesquin Airport, which is located less than 10 minutes from the stadium. We can also organise your transfer to and from the airport so that you can fully enjoy the competition without missing a moment.
360.photoAlt: Book your private jet to the Davis Cup

LIL.airportDescription: Lille Lesquin Airport is perfectly located 15 minutes to the South of the city. It features a terminal that is dedicated to private flights and can accommodate all types of jets, as well as lounges, which enable you to enjoy a peaceful wait for your flight. For more information please contact you LunaJets adviser

372.title: Frieze Art Fair, London
372.curiosity: Your private jet to Frieze London
372.body:
The annual Frieze Art Fair is one of London’s premier art events, attracting tens of thousands of artists, dealers and art-lovers every year. Enjoy unbeatable prices and impeccable service on your private flight to London for the Frieze Art Fair by chartering your private jet with LunaJets.

Since it was launched in 2003, the Frieze Art Fair has grown to become a globally renowned contemporary art showcase that attracts over 170 of the world’s finest national and international art dealers and galleries. Taking place in the beautiful Regent’s Park in Central London, Frieze is a wonderful opportunity to view, browse and buy contemporary art from over 1,000 contributors, including both celebrated artists and up-and-coming talent.

The Art Fair is also famed for its fascinating lectures and education programs, known as ‘Frieze Talks’, which are run by esteemed experts and provide visitors with a wonderful chance to develop and enhance their knowledge and understanding of contemporary art.

LunaJets is at your service 24/7 to organise your private jet to London for this remarkable event and our team also have a wealth of experience in transporting art and would be delighted to assist you if you have pieces that you are bringing to Frieze London. For more information please contact your LunaJets adviser.
372.photoAlt: Charter your private jet to the Frieze Art Fair in London
372.airportCodes: FAB LCY BQH LTN LHR LGW STN OXF EGLW

FAB.airportDescription:
Farnborough Airport, situated an 1 hour and a half west of Central London, has a terminal devoted to private aviation, making it a great option. If you regularly travel with your dog, be advised that Farnborough Airport has a veterinary checkpoint at its disposal. Remember to ask your LunaJets Advisor about the conditions of travelling with a pet. 
For your security, the entry of cars is controlled, so it is necessary to give your flight details to whoever is collecting you, as without them they will not be allowed to enter.

LCY.airportDescription: Located in the heart of the City of London, London City Airport is the best choice if you wish to land your private jet right in the centre of the city. However, this exceptional convenience comes at a price. The landing and parking costs are substantial and specific certification is required, as only a few aircraft categories are able to land there. Be sure to consult your LunaJets' advisor to allow us to provide you with the best possible service.

BQH.airportDescription: Biggin Hill Airport is particularly popular for private jet flights to London as it is positioned less than an hour from the centre. The airport is also equipped with a veterinary checkpoint, enabling you to travel unimpaired with your pet to the UK. Remember to enquire into the conditions of travelling with a pet with your LunaJets Advisor.

LTN.airportDescription: Luton Airport is London's primary business aviation airport and, therefore, would be an excellent choice for your private jet trip. The lounges are as pleasant as they are numerous. It is also the only airport that is open 24/7 and can, therefore, be extremely useful if you have to fly at peculiar times.

LHR.airportDescription: Heathrow International Airport is situated 45 minutes west of London. It is one of Europe's most prominent airports and London's main commercial airport but is scarcely used for private aviation. If necessary, it is possible to take off from Heathrow in a private jet but the airport costs make this extremely unappealing.

LGW.airportDescription: Gatwick is the airport which caters to the south of London and it is located an hour and a half from the centre. More regularly used for commercial flights, it is not particularly recommended for your private jet travel.

STN.airportDescription: Stansted Airport is positioned an hour and a half north-east of London. Although it is usually used for commercial flights, it also offers lounges dedicated to private aviation.

OXF.airportDescription: Situated an hour and a half north-west of London, Oxford Airport is also a good option. Be advised that if you are travelling with your pet, the on-site veterinary authorities will be there to perform the necessary formalities. Remember to ask your LunaJets Advisor about the conditions of travelling with a pet.

blocks.text: The annual Frieze Art Fair is one of London’s premier art events, attracting tens of thousands of artists, dealers and art-lovers every year. Enjoy unbeatable prices and impeccable service on your private flight to London for the Frieze Art Fair by chartering your private jet with LunaJets.

Since it was launched in 2003, the Frieze Art Fair has grown to become a globally renowned contemporary art showcase that attracts over 170 of the world’s finest national and international art dealers and galleries. Taking place in the beautiful Regent’s Park in Central London, Frieze is a wonderful opportunity to view, browse and buy contemporary art from over 1,000 contributors, including both celebrated artists and up-and-coming talent.

The Art Fair is also famed for its fascinating lectures and education programs, known as ‘Frieze Talks’, which are run by esteemed experts and provide visitors with a wonderful chance to develop and enhance their knowledge and understanding of contemporary art.

LunaJets is at your service 24/7 to organise your private jet to London for this remarkable event and our team also have a wealth of experience in transporting art and would be delighted to assist you if you have pieces that you are bringing to Frieze London. For more information please contact your LunaJets adviser.

375.title: Les voiles de Saint-Tropez
375.curiosity: Your Private Jet to Les Voiles St. Tropez
375.body:
Every year at the end of September, the stunning jewel of the French Riviera, Saint Tropez, hosts one of the most prestigious regattas in the Mediterranean; Les Voiles de Saint Tropez.

Originally started over 30 years ago under the name ‘La Nioulargue’, this spectacular event has been running since 1999 and gathers together the most extraordinary mixture of state-of-the-art modern sailing boats and beautiful classic yachts. Racers and sailing enthusiasts come from all corners of the globe to spectate and take part in this one of a kind regatta that sees over 300 boats competing in an unforgettable setting.

What better place to admire these incredible yachts than Saint Tropez, a paradise on the Côte d’Azur, renowned for its white sandy beaches and crystal-clear waters? Where else can you see such an array of traditional and modern yachts racing against one another in the very same regatta?

Book your private jet to Les Voiles de Saint Tropez with LunaJets

Saint Tropez is one of our most popular summer destinations so our team is very experienced with organising flights there. Get in touch now with your LunaJets adviser who would be delighted to arrange your private jet to this unmissable event.
375.photoAlt: Charter your private jet to les Voiles St Tropez

LTT.airportDescription: Saint Tropez La Môle Airport is located 30 minutes southwest of the city. This is the closest airport to the resort but, given the size of the runway, only certain aircraft can land there. Furthermore, during summer the airport is so busy that parking is sometimes difficult. We recommend that you book your trip well in advance and enquire with our team of advisers about the conditions of access to this airport.

TLN.airportDescription: Toulon Hyères Airport is situated an hour west of Saint Tropez. It is an excellent alternative for your private jet flights since it is easier to access and can accommodate much larger aircraft.

CEQ.airportDescription: Cannes Mandelieu Airport is located 15 minutes west of the city, allowing you to reach Cannes, Saint-Tropez or Nice. It has a lot of private aircraft traffic and, therefore, is equipped with everything necessary to allow you a relaxed wait for your flight. However, be aware that since the airport is so busy during the summer, we do recommend that you book your trip well in advance. Your LunaJets adviser would be delighted to answer any further questions you may have.

485.title: Mercedes Benz Fashion Week, New York
485.curiosity: Fly by private jet to the New York Mercedes-Benz Fashion Week
485.body:
The New York Mercedes-Benz Fashion Week sees the whole of the international fashion industry come together for an unmissable event. Since 1943, the world’s most esteemed designers have congregated every year to present their latest creations. LunaJets offers exclusive private jet charter prices to this prestigious event and provides bespoke on-demand solutions for private flights at the best prices on the market.

The New York Mercedes-Benz Fashion Week marks the beginning of the unveiling of this year’s Spring/Summer collections and sees American designers rub shoulders with all the biggest names in international fashion. For industry professionals, designers, trend-spotters, bloggers or clients, this is their opportunity to admire the most recent collections and latest trends, to make orders and to network. For the general public, this is their opportunity to be inspired by the newest creations in high fashion.

The New York Mercedes-Benz Fashion Week attracts people from all corners of the globe and New York Teterboro Airport (TEB-KTEB), which is devoted to private aviation, becomes exceptionally busy at this time. Therefore, in order to be certain of securing take-off and landing slots, we strongly recommend making all your arrangements for your private jet hire well in advance.

Our team of private jet charter experts is at your service to find the perfect private flight solution to correspond to your individual requirements. Our wealth of experience in organizing transatlantic private flights enables us to arrange your private jet to all this season’s biggest fashion shows, in New York, Paris, Milan or London. We are also on hand to organise your transfer from the airport to your final destination.

For more information or to charter your private plane to any Fashion Week, please do not hesitate to contact your LunaJets adviser.
485.photoAlt: Hire your private jet to the Mercedes Benz London Fashion Week

TEB.airportDescription: Located 25 minutes north of Manhattan, Teterboro airport is very central for all your trips to New York by private plane. It offers comfortable lounges just for private aviation, where you can prepare for your flight in peace.

LGA.airportDescription: La Guardia international airport is situated 20 minutes north-east of Manhattan. It offers lounges specially for private aviation. It is an excellent alternative for arranging your commercial - private journeys. However, as this is a highly used airport, the authorities regulate landings and take-offs. Find out more from your LunaJets adviser.

EWR.airportDescription: Newark airport is situated 45 minutes south-west on the edge of Manhattan. It has terminals dedicated to private aviation to allow you to prepare for your flight with ease.

JFK.airportDescription: John Fitzgerald Kennedy international airport is situated 30 minutes south-east of the city. It offers lounges dedicated to private aviation and can prove to be a comfortable alternative for arranging a transfer between your airliner and private jet. Contact us for more information.

We are also on hand to organise your transfer from the airport to your final destination.
For more information or to charter your private plane to any Fashion Week, please do not hesitate to contact your LunaJets adviser.

504.title: Fashion Week, Paris
504.curiosity: Fly private at the best price to Paris Fashion Week with LunaJets
504.body:
LunaJets has exclusive deals on private jet charter to Paris Fashion Week, a remarkable event held in one of the greatest cultural metropolises and most beautiful cities in the world. Contact LunaJets’ expert team today to take advantage of these unbeatable prices on private flights to Paris for Fashion Week.

Since its inception in 1973, Paris Fashion Week has established itself as one of the most important and glamorous events in the fashion world. It is the grand finale of the consecutive ‘Big Four’ Fashion Weeks, with New York, London and Milan hosting the other three, and is therefore the celebration of a climax that represents the culmination of months of work.

Much like the city itself, Paris Fashion Week is extremely culturally diverse, with designers from all corners of the globe choosing the French capital as the perfect place to showcase their latest collections to the world. The most renowned and revered French fashion houses, such as Chanel, Givenchy and Christian Dior, are joined by the some of the world’s most respected international designers to exhibit the most recent trends and styles on the catwalk. Shows take place all over the historic city, including iconic Parisian locations like the Grand Palais and the Espace Eiffel.

Whether you are an industry professional, journalist or just a fashion-lover, Paris Fashion Week will undoubtedly deliver an incredible experience. LunaJets team are on hand 24/7 to organise your private jet to Paris Fashion Week and to ensure that your flight runs smoothly. We would also be delighted to organise your transfer from the airport to your final destination to provide a complete service and to make sure that your journey is entirely hassle-free. Due to the popularity of this wonderful event, it is vital that your make all your travel arrangements well in advance because airport slots book up exceptionally quickly.

For more information or to book your private flight to Paris Fashion Week, please do not hesitate to contact your LunaJets adviser.
504.photoAlt: Book your private jet to the Paris Fashion week
504.airportCodes: LBG CDG ORY POX TNF LFPI

LBG.airportDescription: Paris Le Bourget airport is exclusively dedicated to private aviation. Open over 100 years (1914), it offers a large choice of lounges and welcoming spaces. Ideally situtated 20 minutes north of Paris and 10 minutes from Charles de Gaulle, it is the best solution for your flights to Paris by private jet. Every second year in June, the International Paris Air Show, an aviation festival, is held for aeronautical professionals and the general public. During aerial evolutions, it is possible that this airport may be closed to business aviation for short periods. Your LunaJets adviser can give you more information.

CDG.airportDescription: With its four runways, Roissy Charles de Gaulle international airport is the largest French commercial "hub". Business aircraft can often land here for transfers between commercial and private flights. For cost-efficiency, it is recommended to use Le Bourget for your flights by private plane, as the two airports are only 10 minutes apart. Your LunaJets adviser will be happy to arrange your departure from Charles de Gaulle if necessary.

ORY.airportDescription: Paris-Orly situated 30 minutes to the south of Paris sees very little private aviation but may be used for transfers. It is Paris' secondary airport and an important hub for chartered, regional, diplomatic and medical flights.  Positioning costs for business aircraft mean that it is not recommended. That said, your LunaJets adviser will be happy to arrange your journey.

POX.airportDescription: Pontoise airport can get you to the north-west of Paris. Although there are two terminals for private aviation at Pontoise, there are potential restrictions for landing and taking off here. Find out more from your LunaJets adviser.

TNF.airportDescription: Toussus-le-Noble is situated half an hour to the West of Paris, ideal for getting to the Versailles area. Even if this airport has two runways they are short. Only Light or Very Light jets are allowed to land commercially. Recently the customs office has been closed so only intra-france flights are possible. Noise restriction also limite the usage of this airport.  Your LunaJets adviser can tell you more about the restrictions of use imposed at this airport but be aware that Toussus-le-Noble is a challenging option to use for a private jet flight to Paris.

LFPI.airportDescription: Issy-les-Moulineaux heliport is ideal for getting to Paris city centre quickly. Helicopter transfers can be arranged from different private aviation airports to this heliport in west Paris.

For more information or to book your private flight to Paris Fashion Week, please do not hesitate to contact your LunaJets adviser.

507.title: Rugby World Cup, London
507.curiosity: Fly private at the best price to the 2015 Rugby World Cup with Lunajets
507.body:
After four long years of waiting, the autumn of 2015 will see the return of the Rugby World Cup, an incredible event where all the world’s top teams compete for the coveted Webb Ellis Cup. LunaJets’ team are available 24/7 and have exclusive deals on private jet charter to the Rugby World Cup.

The 2015 Rugby World Cup kicks off on 18th September with England taking on Fiji at the iconic Twickenham Stadium in London. The co-hosts, who haven’t won the trophy since Jonny Wilkinson’s legendary drop kick in Sydney in 2003, will be hoping to replicate New Zealand’s achievement from 2011 of lifting the trophy on home turf. However, the All Blacks and the South Africans, the world’s number 1 and 2 sides respectively, will also be optimistic about their chances and you can never write off the Australian team, who won the only other World Cup Final ever played at Twickenham in 1991. Wales, as co-hosts, will believe that their passionate fans can spur them on to win the final at Twickenham on 31st October and the French, having come so close in 2011, will be hoping that this is their year to finally win their first World Cup. Whether you are a die-hard fan or not, the Rugby World Cup is a unique event that is certain to provide an unforgettable experience.

From the USA to Namibia, Japan to Georgia, teams and their devoted fans will come from all over the world to compete and experience the astonishing passion and unique atmosphere that surrounds this remarkable event. Wherever you are coming from, LunaJets are offering special rates on private flights to the Rugby World Cup and, in addition to their capacity to always provide the best price on the market, our expert team pride themselves on their efficient and professional service, ensuring that you don’t miss a moment of the action.

Please be advised that, due to the increase in air traffic during the tournament, it is vital that you make all your travel arrangements well in advance to be certain of securing take-off and landing slots. LunaJets guarantees the best prices on private jets to the Rugby World Cup and would also be delighted to organise your onward transfer from the airport.

For more information, please do not hesitate to contact your LunaJets adviser.
507.photoAlt: Book your Private Jet to the Rugby World Cup

531.title: Cricket World Cup, Melbourne
531.curiosity: Your Private Jet to the Cricket World Cup Final
531.body:
The ICC Cricket World Cup is one of the world’s most viewed sporting events and LunaJets has exclusive deals on private jets to the World Cup Final in Melbourne so you don’t miss a moment of the action.

After 49 matches over 6 weeks at 14 venues across New Zealand and Australia, the ICC Cricket World Cup, the international championship of One Day International (ODI) cricket, will reach its climax at the famous and historic Melbourne Cricket Ground, or MCG as its known, in what is certain to be a tense and closely-fought final. The 2015 Cricket World Cup has been one of the most exciting and unpredictable World Cups in history, with bat largely dominating over ball and new records being set throughout the tournament. With both the co-hosts looking strong, along with defending-champions India and an impressive Sri Lanka side, it is anyone’s guess who will be lifting the trophy at the end of the day.

Whether you are a lifelong cricket fan or not, the ICC Cricket World Cup Final is one of the great events in sport and the atmosphere at the MCG for the final will certainly provide a unique and unforgettable experience.

LunaJets has extensive experience in organizing private flights to the world’s biggest sporting events and our expert team are at your service 24/7 to find the ideal flight solution to suit you, whatever your itinerary. We are also all too aware of how busy airports become during such event and therefore how essential it is for you to make all your travel arrangements well in advance. In addition to chartering your private jet to the Cricket World Cup Final, LunaJets would also be delighted to arrange your transfer from the airport.

For more information or to book your private flight to Melbourne for the Cricket World Cup Final, please do not hesitate to contact your LunaJets adviser.
531.photoAlt: Book your Private Jet to the International Cricket World Cup ICC

555.title: Monaco Yacht Show, Principality of Monaco
555.curiosity: Your Private Jet to the Monaco Yacht Show
555.body:
Held annually towards the end of September, The Monaco Yacht Show is the ultimate luxury rendezvous for elite clientele. LunaJets is on hand to find a tailor-made flight solution for your private jet charter to Monaco (Nice Airport) for the Monaco Yacht Show.

Created in 1991, the event has grown to become the most prestigious and anticipated superyacht meeting in the yachting calendar. This year, from the 23rd until the 26th of September, hundreds of outstanding events will take place on board, at the exhibition and at many distinguished luxury hotels in the area. It is the only opportunity in the year to see such an impressive fleet of 115 super and megayachts from 25 to 100 metres long, many of which will make their premiere at the show, as well as exhibitions of 500 world leading luxury yachting companies, in the glamorous setting of Monaco-Monte Carlo, within 9,000 square metres of exhibition space.

With an average attendance of 34,000 professional visitors and high net worth clients from all over the world, Port Hercules becomes the international hub of superyacht business. LunaJets’ partner CharterWorld will also be present and will be glad to assist you during the event.

LunaJets is offering exclusive deals on private flights to Monaco for the Monaco Yacht Show and our dedicated team are at your service 24/7 to take care of your every need and ensure that your private flight runs smoothly and efficiently. We are all too aware of how busy the airports surrounding the event become and therefore strongly recommend that you make all your travel arrangements well in advance to be sure of securing take-off and landing slots.

For more information or to charter your private jet to the Monaco Yacht Show, please do not hesitate to contact your LunaJets adviser.
555.photoAlt: Hire your private jet to the Monaco Yacht Show

NCE.airportDescription: Nice Côte d’Azur Airport is the closest to the principality. Located 30 minutes south west of the city, it has terminals that are dedicated to private aviation and can accommodate all types of jets. It is the Côte d’Azur’s major hub and one of the busiest airports in Europe. It is the ideal option for your private jet flight with LunaJets.

566.title: International Film Festival, Cannes
566.curiosity: Your Private Jet to Cannes International Film Festival
566.body:
The Cannes International Film Festival is an exceptionally prestigious event that is held every year in one of the most glamorous cities on France’s stunning Côte D’Azur. Get in touch with LunaJets’ expert team for the best prices on private jets to Cannes for the Cannes International Film Festival.

Since it was founded in 1946, the Cannes Film Festival has grown to become one of the most important dates in the film industry calendar. In mid-May every year, the entirety of the film industry, from A-list Hollywood celebrities to esteemed directors and studio executives, congregate in the French city. The Festival is a fantastic opportunity for directors to showcase their latest creations and attracts films of all genres from all over the world. The city comes to life during the festival, as thousands come to experience the incredible atmosphere, as well as Cannes’ beautiful beaches and legendary VIP parties.

The Cannes International Film Festival is an event like no other and LunaJets are at your service 24/7 to charter your private jet to the Cannes CEQ Airport this May. For more information, please do not hesitate to contact your LunaJets advisor.
566.photoAlt: Charter your private jet to the International Cannes Film Festival

CEQ.airportDescription: Cannes Mandelieu Airport is located 15 minutes west of the city, allowing you to reach Cannes, Saint-Tropez or Nice. It has a lot of private aircraft traffic and, therefore, is equipped with everything necessary to allow you a relaxed wait for your flight. However, be aware that since the airport is so busy during the summer, we do recommend that you book your trip well in advance. Your LunaJets adviser would be delighted to answer any further questions you may have.

blocks.text: The Cannes International Film Festival is an exceptionally prestigious event that is held every year in one of the most glamorous cities on France’s stunning Côte D’Azur. Get in touch with LunaJets’ expert team for the best prices on private jets to Cannes for the Cannes International Film Festival.

Since it was founded in 1946, the Cannes Film Festival has grown to become one of the most important dates in the film industry calendar. In mid-May every year, the entirety of the film industry, from A-list Hollywood celebrities to esteemed directors and studio executives, congregate in the French city. The Festival is a fantastic opportunity for directors to showcase their latest creations and attracts films of all genres from all over the world. The city comes to life during the festival, as thousands come to experience the incredible atmosphere, as well as Cannes’ beautiful beaches and legendary VIP parties.

The Cannes International Film Festival is an event like no other and LunaJets are at your service 24/7 to charter your private jet to the Cannes CEQ Airport this May. For more information, please do not hesitate to contact your LunaJets advisor.

567.title: Grand Prix, Monaco
567.curiosity: Your Private Jet to Monaco Grand Prix
567.body:
The Monaco Grand Prix brings together intense racing and extreme luxury to become an extraordinary event like no other. LunaJets’ dedicated team are at your service 24/7 to organise your private jet to Nice Aiport (NCE) for the Monaco Grand Prix.

The Monaco Grand Prix was first run in 1929 and has been a major highlight of the Formula 1 World Championship calendar for many years. This historic race is one of three events that make up the Triple Crown of motorsport, along with Le Mans 24 Hour Race and the Indianapolis 500. Drivers in the Monaco Grand Prix battle it out through the narrow streets of Monte Carlo that are transformed into the legendary circuit for the weekend. It is arguably the most challenging circuit in Formula 1, where a good qualifying performance is essential due to the number of extremely narrow corners making it nearly impossible to overtake. The Monaco Grand Prix truly is the race that every driver dreams of winning and every aspect of their driving skill and bravery will be tested before they have the chance to reach the top step of the podium.

As well as fantastic racing, the Monaco Grand Prix weekend is a wonderful opportunity to enjoy the glamour of one of the world’s most luxurious cities. LunaJets are on hand to ensure every aspect of your trip to Monaco runs smoothly and efficiently, including your helicopter transfer to Monte Carlo.

For more information or to book your private jet to Monaco for the Monaco Grand Prix, please contact your LunaJets adviser.
567.photoAlt: Charter your private jet to the Monaco F1 Grand Prix

NCE.airportDescription: Nice Côte d’Azur Airport is the closest to the principality. Located 30 minutes south west of the city, it has terminals that are dedicated to private aviation and can accommodate all types of jets. It is the Côte d’Azur’s major hub and one of the busiest airports in Europe. It is the ideal option for your private jet flight with LunaJets.

blocks.text: The Monaco Grand Prix brings together intense racing and extreme luxury to become an extraordinary event like no other. LunaJets’ dedicated team are at your service 24/7 to organise your private jet to Nice Aiport (NCE) for the Monaco Grand Prix.

570.title: Spanish Grand Prix, Barcelona
570.curiosity: Your private jet to the Formula 1 Spanish Grand Prix
570.body:
Book your private jet to Barcelona for the Formula 1 Spanish Grand Prix with LunaJets for exclusive prices and an unparalleled service.

The Spanish Grand Prix is one of the oldest races in Formula 1, having celebrated its centenary in 2013, and has been held at a number of different racetracks over the years. Every year since 1991, the Circuit de Barcelona-Catalunya has been the location for one of the most exciting races in the Formula 1 World Championship calendar. The track is extremely challenging for drivers, featuring a number of low and high-speed corners and its rough surface causes high tyre degradation, making the Spanish Grand Prix a very tactical race. The atmosphere at the Circuit de Barcelona-Catalunya is always electric and spectators are certain to be treated to an intense and absorbing weekend of racing. The Spanish Grand Prix is also a wonderful excuse to visit Barcelona in spring and enjoy the sunshine in one of Europe’s most beautiful and culturally rich cities.

For more information or to book your private flight to Barcelona for the Spanish Grand Prix, please do not hesitate to contact your LunaJets advisor.
570.photoAlt: Hire your private jet to the F1 Spanish Grand Prix Barcelona

BCN.airportDescription: Barcelona International Airport is situated 20 minutes to the south-east of the city centre. It offers a terminal dedicated to private aviation which welcomes all types of jets as well as lounges where you can prepare for your flight. However, as this is a very popular airport, landings and take-offs are subject to authorization. Find out more from your LunaJets adviser.

GRO.airportDescription: Girona airport is located 1 hour and 20 minutes to the north east of Barcelona. This airport is a good alternative for getting to the north of Barcelona by private jet. It offers a terminal dedicated to private aviation and its long runway - over 2km - means that all types of private jets can be chartered departing from or arriving at the airport. Your LunaJets adviser will advise you on the best itinerary for your needs.

REU.airportDescription: Reus airport is situated 1 hour and 20 minutes to the south west of Barcelona. This airport is a good alternative for getting to the south of Barcelona by private jet. It offers a terminal dedicated to private aviation and its long runway - over 2km - means that all types of private jets can be chartered departing from or arriving at the airport.

blocks.text: Book your private jet to Barcelona for the Formula 1 Spanish Grand Prix with LunaJets for exclusive prices and an unparalleled service.

For more information or to book your private flight to Barcelona for the Spanish Grand Prix, please do not hesitate to contact your LunaJets advisor.

579.title: EBACE, Geneva
579.body:
The European Business Aviation Convention & Exhibition (EBACE) is an annual event held in Geneva’s Palexpo convention centre just a stone’s throw from LunaJets’ headquarters. EBACE is jointly hosted by the European Business Aviation Association (EBAA) and the National Business Aviation Association (NBAA) – the leading organizations representing business aviation in Europe and the United States respectively.

EBACE is the major annual meeting for the business aviation community and over 12,000 attendees representing nearly 100 countries congregate in Geneva, Switzerland for the three-day event. Professionals from every area of the industry attend the convention, including manufacturers, avionics firms, handling organisations and charter companies, many of whom showcase their most recent private jet designs, newest technology and latest services for the first time at the event. LunaJets’ team attend every year as we always strive to keep up to date with all industry trends and developments and EBACE is an excellent opportunity to network with manufacturers and operators to maintain our professional advantage that ensures the best prices and service for our clients.

For more information regarding EBACE, please do not hesitate to contact LunaJets’ dedicated team.
579.photoAlt: Charter your private jet to EBACE, the European Business Aviation event

GVA.airportDescription: Geneva international airport is located only 15 minutes from the historic centre of the city. Private aviation is very popular here, with several lounges dedicated to welcoming you before your trip. However, Geneva has only one runway, which is in high demand. There is heavy regulation of plane rotations and slots need to be assigned for landings and take-offs. Find out more beforehand from your LunaJets adviser who can secure the slot for your flight.

589.title: Tour de France, France
589.curiosity: Your Private Jet to the Tour de France
589.body:
LunaJets is your perfect partner for private jet flights to the Tour de France with unbeatable prices on private jet charter to any stage of this incredible sporting event.

The Tour de France is a multi-stage bicycle race held annually since 1903 that generally takes place over 3 weeks during the month of July. It is widely considered to be the most prestigious of cycling’s three ‘Grand Tours’, which also include the Giro d’Italia and the Vuelta a España. The race’s course changes every year, although it is always comprised of a mixture of time trials, flat and mountain stages that see riders taking on the gruelling inclines of the Pyrenees and the Alps. Around 22 teams, made up of the world’s finest international cyclists, take part in the Tour de France, a race that tests every aspect of a rider’s technique, endurance and stamina before they reach the famous final stage in Paris, ending on the Champs-Élysées.

LunaJets’ team are at your service 24/7 to organise your private flight to any stage of the Tour de France. For more information or to book your private jet, please do not hesitate to contact your LunaJets adviser.
589.photoAlt: Charter your Private Jet to the Tour de France
589.airportCodes: LBG CDG ORY POX TNF LFPI

LBG.airportDescription: Paris Le Bourget airport is exclusively dedicated to private aviation. Open over 100 years (1914), it offers a large choice of lounges and welcoming spaces. Ideally situtated 20 minutes north of Paris and 10 minutes from Charles de Gaulle, it is the best solution for your flights to Paris by private jet. Every second year in June, the International Paris Air Show, an aviation festival, is held for aeronautical professionals and the general public. During aerial evolutions, it is possible that this airport may be closed to business aviation for short periods. Your LunaJets adviser can give you more information.

CDG.airportDescription: With its four runways, Roissy Charles de Gaulle international airport is the largest French commercial "hub". Business aircraft can often land here for transfers between commercial and private flights. For cost-efficiency, it is recommended to use Le Bourget for your flights by private plane, as the two airports are only 10 minutes apart. Your LunaJets adviser will be happy to arrange your departure from Charles de Gaulle if necessary.

ORY.airportDescription: Paris-Orly situated 30 minutes to the south of Paris sees very little private aviation but may be used for transfers. It is Paris' secondary airport and an important hub for chartered, regional, diplomatic and medical flights. Positioning costs for business aircraft mean that it is not recommended. That said, your LunaJets adviser will be happy to arrange your journey.

POX.airportDescription: Pontoise airport can get you to the north-west of Paris. Although there are two terminals for private aviation at Pontoise, there are potential restrictions for landing and taking off here. Find out more from your LunaJets adviser.

TNF.airportDescription: Toussus-le-Noble is situated half an hour to the West of Paris, ideal for getting to the Versailles area. Even if this airport has two runways they are short. Only Light or Very Light jets are allowed to land commercially. Recently the customs office has been closed so only intra-france flights are possible. Noise restriction also limite the usage of this airport.  Your LunaJets adviser can tell you more about the restrictions of use imposed at this airport but be aware that Toussus-le-Noble is a challenging option to use for a private jet flight to Paris.

LFPI.airportDescription: Issy-les-Moulineaux heliport is ideal for getting to Paris city centre quickly. Helicopter transfers can be arranged from different private aviation airports to this heliport in west Paris.

LunaJets’ team are at your service 24/7 to organise your private flight to any stage of the Tour de France. For more information or to book your private jet, please do not hesitate to contact your LunaJets adviser.

590.title: Canadian Grand Prix, Montreal
590.curiosity: Your Private Jet to the Canadian Grand Prix
590.body:
Get in touch with LunaJets’ expert team for the best prices on private jets to Montreal for the Canadian Grand Prix.

Every year at the beginning of June, Montreal hosts one of the highlights of the Formula 1 World Championship Calendar – the Canadian Grand Prix. The race has been a part of the Formula 1 World Championship since 1967 and is held at the Circuit Gilles Villeneuve, named after the famous Canadian Ferrari driver who tragically lost his life in an accident during qualifying for the Belgian Grand Prix of 1982. Canada is an extremely tactical race for teams and tests drivers to the limit, due to a number of challenging hairpins, tight chicanes and hard-breaking sections. The final corner of the circuit is known for crashes involving former world championship winners and many greats have fallen victim to the so-called ‘Wall of Champions’, including Michael Schumacher, Sebastian Vettel and Jenson Button. Nothing can match the tension and atmosphere of a Formula 1 Grand Prix weekend and LunaJets are at your service 24/7 to ensure you experience this remarkable spectacle first-hand.

For more information or to book your private jet to the Canadian Grand Prix, please do not hesitate to contact your LunaJets advisor.
590.photoAlt: Charter your private jet to the Canadian Formula 1 Grand Prix

611.title: UEFA Champions League Final
611.curiosity: Your Private Jet to the UEFA Champions League Final
611.body:
LunaJets is delighted to offer exclusive deals on private jet charter to the UEFA Champions League Final, which takes place in Cardiff, United Kingdom. Get in touch with out expert team, available 24/7, to take advantage of our unbeatable prices. 

The UEFA Champions League is an annual club football tournament that sees the best teams from Europe’s domestic leagues compete to win one of the most coveted trophies in world sport. Millions of fans from all over the world will tune in to watch the final! Both clubs have impressive pedigree in the competition and the atmosphere in the stadium will reach its climax, but it would be impossible to predict which of these two great sides will prevail on the night.

Nothing can compare to witnessing a final of this magnitude first-hand and LunaJets are at your service to find the right flight to suit your itinerary to ensure you don’t miss a moment of this remarkable spectacle. Due to the popularity of this event it is essential that you make all your travel arrangements well in advance to be sure of securing take-off and landing slots.

We recommend to use the following airports:

- CWL: Cardiff Airport
- BRS: Bristol Airport (due to high demand, it might be difficult to obtain the desired slots at Cardiff Airport).

For more information or to book your private jet to the UEFA Champions League Final, please do not hesitate to contact your LunaJets advisor.
611.photoAlt: Book your private jet to the UEFA Champions League Final, Berlin

614.title: 24 Hours Race, Le Mans
614.curiosity: Your Private Jet to the 24 Hours of Le Mans Race
614.body:
24 hours of Le Mans race takes place mid of June just outside Le Mans, France and LunaJets has unbeatable and exclusive deals on private jet charter to this fantastic event.

The race, which takes place at the Circuit de la Sarthe, 200km southwest of Paris, is the world’s oldest active sports car endurance race, having been held every year since 1923. Known as ‘the Grand Prix of Endurance and Efficiency’, Le Mans is one of the most prestigious races in motor sport and fans flock from all over the world to enjoy this special event.

The 24-hour race begins in the mid-afternoon, running all through the night and there are usually around 50 competing teams, each with at least 3 drivers, racing in a number of different categories. All the biggest names in motorsport and luxury consumer sports cars have won the race in the past, from Ferrari and Bentley to Bugatti and Aston Martin, although it is Audi who have dominated in recent years. Le Mans is an extremely logistical and tactical race, as competitors must balance pace with the cars capacity to run for 24 hours without breaking down while conserving and preserving fuel, tyres and brakes. Furthermore, being such a demanding race, it is also a rigorous test of a driver’s endurance, stamina and concentration.

Le Mans 24-hour race is a truly incredible spectacle and LunaJets expert team are at your service to find the ideal private jet to suit your individual needs at the very best price. Please be advised that Le Mans brings a lot of air traffic to the area and, therefore, it is crucial that you make your travel arrangements well in advance.

For more information or to book your private jet to Le Mans, please contact your LunaJets advisor.
614.photoAlt: Book your Private Jet to the 24H of Le Mans

618.title: Paris Air Show
618.curiosity: Your Private Jet to the Paris Air Show
618.body:
Come and join LunaJets at the Paris Air Show for an incredible and unique weeklong event held at Paris Le Bourget Airport. Get in touch with our expert team to fly private at the best price to the Air Show this year.

The Paris Air Show is the world’s oldest and largest air show, which sees 2000 exhibitors and over 130,000 visitors come from all over the world to Le Bourget, just outside the French capital. The Air Show is primarily a commercial event, as the world’s most eminent manufacturers demonstrate their new aircraft and the latest technology in both military and civil aviation to potential customers. LunaJets, of course, will be represented at the Paris Air Show, as we are always committed to keeping up with the latest innovations in private aviation and remaining at the forefront of a rapidly progressing industry.

The Paris Air Show is not just a commercial event, however, and the last three days are open to the public who are invited to admire the magnificent aircraft on show. They will be treated to fly-by displays and many aircraft performing mesmerizing stunts in the skies above them. The Air Show truly is a wonderful spectacle, whether you are in the market for an aircraft or not, and we would love to see you there.

Due to the popularity of this fantastic event, we suggest that you make all your travel plans well in advance to avoid the risk of disappointment.  LunaJets team provide an unparalleled service, as well as exclusive and unbeatable prices on private flights to the Paris Air Show. Please contact your LunaJets advisor for more information.
618.photoAlt: Book your private jet to Paris Air Show
618.airportCodes: LBG CDG ORY POX TNF LFPI

Located just 11km northeast of the French capital, the airport is Europe’s busiest private jet airport and it exclusively serves private flights to provide ultimate service, convenience and luxury. It can accommodate all categories of aircraft and has numerous private terminals with comfortable VIP lounges. For more information or to book your private flight to the Paris Air Show, please contact your LunaJets adviser.

628.title: Royal Ascot, London
628.curiosity: Your Private Jet to the Royal Ascot
628.body:
Royal Ascot is one of the world’s most prestigious race meetings, which has established itself as a centrepiece of Britain’s social calendar. Get in touch with LunaJets to take advantage of our unbeatable prices on private flights to London for this unique event.

Royal Ascot was founded by Queen Anne in 1711 and it has since grown to become Britain’s most valuable race meeting and an extremely prestigious event that attracts racegoers from all over the world. The 5-day event is made up of a number of world-class races, including the famous Ascot Gold Cup on Ladies’ Day and the Diamond Jubilee Stakes on the final day of the meeting. Every race day begins with the Royal Procession, as the British Monarchy attends the event every year, which is as much about pageantry and tradition as it is racing. Royal Ascot is also a spectacle of fashion and style and there is a strict dress code to which attendees must adhere, particularly if they are entering the Royal Enclosure to mingle with Britain’s high society. Attracting over 300,000 people over the week, Royal Ascot is Europe’s best-attended race meeting and is an important social event that combines a unique degree of prestige and luxury with fantastic racing.

LunaJets team are on hand 24/7 to take care of every aspect of your private travel to Royal Ascot, not only organizing your private jet to London but also arranging your transfer to the racecourse, either by car or helicopter. For more information or to charter your private jet to London for Royal Ascot, please do not hesitate to contact your LunaJets advisor.
628.photoAlt: Charter your private jet to Royal Ascot London
628.airportCodes: FAB LCY BQH LTN LHR LGW STN OXF EGLW

FAB.airportDescription: Farnborough Airport, situated an 1 hour and a half west of Central London, has a terminal devoted to private aviation, making it a great option. If you regularly travel with your dog, be advised that Farnborough Airport has a veterinary checkpoint at its disposal. Remember to ask your LunaJets Advisor about the conditions of travelling with a pet. For your security, the entry of cars is controlled, so it is necessary to give your flight details to whoever is collecting you, as without them they will not be allowed to enter.

LCY.airportDescription: Located in the heart of the City of London, London City Airport is the best choice if you wish to land your private jet right in the centre of the city. However, this exceptional convenience comes at a price. The landing and parking costs are substantial and specific certification is required, as only a few aircraft categories are able to land there. Be sure to consult your LunaJets' advisor to allow us to provide you with the best possible service.

BQH.airportDescription: Biggin Hill Airport is particularly popular for private jet flights to London as it is positioned less than an hour from the centre. The airport is also equipped with a veterinary checkpoint, enabling you to travel unimpaired with your pet to the UK. Remember to enquire into the conditions of travelling with a pet with your LunaJets Advisor.

LTN.airportDescription: Luton Airport is London's primary business aviation airport and, therefore, would be an excellent choice for your private jet trip. The lounges are as pleasant as they are numerous. It is also the only airport that is open 24/7 and can, therefore, be extremely useful if you have to fly at peculiar times.

LHR.airportDescription: Heathrow International Airport is situated 45 minutes west of London. It is one of Europe's most prominent airports and London's main commercial airport but is scarcely used for private aviation. If necessary, it is possible to take off from Heathrow in a private jet but the airport costs make this extremely unappealing.

LGW.airportDescription: Gatwick is the airport which caters to the south of London and it is located an hour and a half from the centre. More regularly used for commercial flights, it is not particularly recommended for your private jet travel.

STN.airportDescription: Stansted Airport is positioned an hour and a half north-east of London. Although it is usually used for commercial flights, it also offers lounges dedicated to private aviation.

OXF.airportDescription: Situated an hour and a half north-west of London, Oxford Airport is also a good option. Be advised that if you are travelling with your pet, the on-site veterinary authorities will be there to perform the necessary formalities. Remember to ask your LunaJets Advisor about the conditions of travelling with a pet.

blocks.text: Royal Ascot is one of the world’s most prestigious race meetings, which has established itself as a centrepiece of Britain’s social calendar. Get in touch with LunaJets to take advantage of our unbeatable prices on private flights to London for this unique event.

Royal Ascot was founded by Queen Anne in 1711 and it has since grown to become Britain’s most valuable race meeting and an extremely prestigious event that attracts racegoers from all over the world. The 5-day event is made up of a number of world-class races, including the famous Ascot Gold Cup on Ladies’ Day and the Diamond Jubilee Stakes on the final day of the meeting. Every race day begins with the Royal Procession, as the British Monarchy attends the event every year, which is as much about pageantry and tradition as it is racing. Royal Ascot is also a spectacle of fashion and style and there is a strict dress code to which attendees must adhere, particularly if they are entering the Royal Enclosure to mingle with Britain’s high society. Attracting over 300,000 people over the week, Royal Ascot is Europe’s best-attended race meeting and is an important social event that combines a unique degree of prestige and luxury with fantastic racing.

LunaJets team are on hand 24/7 to take care of every aspect of your private travel to Royal Ascot, not only organizing your private jet to London but also arranging your transfer to the racecourse, either by car or helicopter. For more information or to charter your private jet to London for Royal Ascot, please do not hesitate to contact your LunaJets advisor.

631.title: Art Basel
631.curiosity: Your private jet to Art Basel
631.body:
Since it was founded in 1970, Art Basel has grown to become one of the most esteemed international art shows of its kind for modern and contemporary works. Book your private jet to Basel for this fantastic event with LunaJets for unbeatable prices and an unparalleled service.

Art Basel takes place every June in the Swiss city of Basel, located on the border of Switzerland, Germany and France, which has been a cultural capital for centuries. This prestigious event attracts over 300 leading galleries from Africa, Asia, Europe and North & South America, making it a truly multi-cultural showcase of talent. Every artistic medium is exhibited at the show, from paintings, sculptures and drawings to photography, film and installations, providing the tens of thousands of visitors with the opportunity to admire an exceptionally broad range of work by both masters of Modern and contemporary art and emerging talent. Attendees are also able to challenge and deepen their knowledge of the art world thanks to talk from recognised industry experts and art historians and there are countless other events held at museums and galleries across the city. Art Basel is an important event that acts as a platform for galleries to showcase pieces to an international audience and provides a wonderful experience as well as the chance to enjoy one of Europe’s most intriguing cities during the summer.

For more information or to book your private jet to Art Basel, please do not hesitate to contact your LunaJets advisor.
631.photoAlt: Charter your private jet to Art Basel

642.title: Austrian Grand Prix, Spielberg
642.curiosity: Your Private Jet to the F1 Austrian Grand Prix
642.body:
Enjoy an unparalleled level of service and unbeatable prices on private jet flights to the Formula 1 Austrian Grand Prix by getting in touch with LunaJets' team.

The Austrian Grand Prix was first held in 1963 and over the years has been the scene of numerous historic moments in Formula 1, including high profile upsets, dramatic collisions and incredible racing. After a ten-year absence, 2014 saw the return of the Austrian Grand Prix to the Formula 1 World Championship calendar, which now takes place at the recently renovated Red Bull Ring, in Spielberg, central Austria. The track is technically very demanding, with a broad range of high and low-speed corners that force drivers to demonstrate extreme bravery and skill by braking late and overtaking at high speed. Consequently, the race is very unpredictable and exciting, which, particularly when combined with the fantastic atmosphere, makes the Austrian Grand Prix a truly remarkable spectacle.

LunaJets are on hand 24/7 to find the right flight solution to suit your individual itinerary, ensuring you receive an entirely bespoke service and the best prices on the market. For more information or to book your private jet to the Formula 1 Austrian Grand Prix, please contact your LunaJets advisor.
642.photoAlt: Charter your private jet to the Austrian Formula 1 Grand Prix

646.title: British Grand Prix, Silverstone
646.curiosity: Your private jet to the F1 British Grand Prix
646.body:
The Formula 1 British Grand Prix is a highlight of the World Championship calendar that takes place every year at the beginning of July. LunaJets are at your service 24/7 to find the right flight solution to suit your requirements, offering the best prices on the market on private flights to the British Grand Prix.

Located in Northamptonshire in the English countryside, Silverstone Circuit first held the British Grand Prix in 1950 and has since established itself as one of the most famous races in Formula 1. The track is designed to challenge every aspect of a driver’s technique, skill and bravery, combining slow chicanes and hairpins with long sweeping bends and fast straights. The race is also extremely tactical for teams and pit stop and tyre strategies have defined the outcome on many occasion. Silverstone is one of the best Grand Prix events for fans, with a number of grandstands providing views over the circuit and creating a truly unique atmosphere, improved even more by the incredible aerobatic displays from the famous Red Arrows. The drama of a Formula 1 World Championship weekend is truly unique and the British Grand Prix guarantees to provide an amazing experience and spectacle for those fortunate enough to attend.

For more information or to book your private jet and transfer to the Formula 1 British Grand Prix, please contact your LunaJets advisor.
646.photoAlt: Hire your private jet to the British Formula 1 GP

FAB.airportDescription: Farnborough Airport, situated an 1 hour and a half west of Central London, has a terminal devoted to private aviation, making it a great option. If you regularly travel with your dog, be advised that Farnborough Airport has a veterinary checkpoint at its disposal. Remember to ask your LunaJets Advisor about the conditions of travelling with a pet. For your security, the entry of cars is controlled, so it is necessary to give your flight details to whoever is collecting you, as without them they will not be allowed to enter.

LCY.airportDescription: Located in the heart of the City of London, London City Airport is the best choice if you wish to land your private jet right in the centre of the city. However, this exceptional convenience comes at a price. The landing and parking costs are substantial and specific certification is required, as only a few aircraft categories are able to land there. Be sure to consult your LunaJets' advisor to allow us to provide you with the best possible service.

BQH.airportDescription: Biggin Hill Airport is particularly popular for private jet flights to London as it is positioned less than an hour from the centre. The airport is also equipped with a veterinary checkpoint, enabling you to travel unimpaired with your pet to the UK. Remember to enquire into the conditions of travelling with a pet with your LunaJets Advisor.
